title: Man sought in November shooting under arrest
content:
Marcos Antonio Hernandez, 30, was arraigned Thursday morning on four counts of aggravated assault after turning himself in to police Wednesday. His bond was set at $80,000.
Hernandez is accused of opening fire in the 1800 block of FM 802, wounding four people. Police were called to the scene at 2 a.m. Sunday, Nov. 22 after four people had been shot.
The wounded were transported to a local hospital, where they received treatment for non-life-threatening injuries.
